评论详情: Great shoes, very comfortable and I feel very confident when I walk as I get the same feeling of walking as if I’m barefoot. Very flexible, move with your feet, stylish and pretty inexpensive. Would definitely buy more pairs of these shoes..

评论概述: Close to perfect for a casual barefoot shoe.
评论详情: These are the perfect blend of minimalist function and urban style. With a zero-drop sole, wide toe box, they deliver excellent ground feel while maintaining a sleek aesthetic. I'm going to spray these down with some scotch guard to deal with the excessive winter rain in the pacific northwest to see how they hold up.
These pair, I wear everywhere, I even own a pair strictly for the gym.

评论概述: Fit snug, good quality, are they worth it for your first pair, YES.
评论详情: This is my first pair of "Barefoot" shoes, I'll say that I will probably buy another pair after having this pair, maybe just spend a little bit more for a little bit better quality because you get what you pay for, they are good shoes but I really don't see them lasting me more then 6-8 months because once you wear them a couple times the heels and the area around the stitching of the upper and lower half have kind of become loose and really worn in and I've only worn them about 5 or 6 times, are they worth it for your first pair, YES.

toe box is wide enough for me but might not be wide enough for some, fit was true to size for me but it seems it varies according to some reviews, doesn't seem like it will be too durable though and the glue is visible, material is a dust magnet though that should be expected for canvas shoes i guess, they're warm, comfortable and look pretty decent, good value for money for a barefoot shoe

评论概述: Great shoes, a little short and narrow
评论详情: They are comfortable, flexible and lightweight. Nothing digs or scratches, and nothing rubs! Unfortunately they run a little small. Normally I wear a US men's 11 wide, but even the 12 wide in this shoe only gives about 1/2 inch clearance beyond the toe and the area of the shoe between the laces and toes (the "ball"?) feels very snug. Overall, they are a great value and for but should not be considered a "wide" width.
My doctor wanted me to wear this shoes after a motorcycle accident and surgery. Helping my toes to stay flat. Their kinda cheap shoes also cheap price but their a good start

I buy these as soon as the previous ones start to wear down.  Usually about 4-5 months of every day use, climbing on roofs, up and down ladders.  The insoles wear out way quicker than the shoes.  So invest another $14 into some good insoles and you'll be super happy.  Seams hold together, bottom grip be gripping, the canvas it's made out of is thick and durable.  10/10 would recommend.
Insoles shrank over time now my toes are hanging 10 and are no longer comfortable. Return window has closed

评论概述: Comfortable unless you have to walk on gravel
评论详情: My husband said these are comfortable but he also said walking on our gravel driveway was like walking barefooted on rocks.
Very comfortable.  Plenty of room  in the toe area.
The shoes are at least a size smaller than advertised

评论概述: Finally a decent dollar value for a job specific shoe
评论详情: I can't wear boots / high tops currently and figured I'd give these a try. Very happy so far. I'm pretty hard on shoes and these seem to be holding up so far.
Definitely will order again. I added some insoles because I walk on concrete all day long at the hospital. These are the most comfortable shoes I’ve ever owned.

I was really surprised on how comfortable the shoes were straight out of the box. It’s a nice material, though very very squeaky shoes if you accidentally drag your foot lol. Overall one of the best kind of shoes you can get for this kinda price.
Overall fit is odd
They make my feet warm.  I had to re-lace them, omitting the lowest eyes, to make them not tight around the bridge of my feet.
Very comfortable. Durable. Style is nice, even with it being a wider toe. Definitely recommend! Will purchase again!
I like these better than Xeros, flexible, comfortable, minimalist design, respectful price. Good shoe, great shoe.
I was using them casually. Then started using them at work which I don't recommend if you work in shop environments.
These are a great way to test the barefoot experience before you drop $200 on a pair of premium barefoot shoes and regret it 😂

These shoes are exactly what I was looking for. All other shoes I looked for couldn't account for my wide feet, but these fit like a glove (or like a shoe, I suppose). The construction and materials are good and have lasted me several months so far without any significant wear & tear. However, I did need to buy myself a pair of cheap gel insoles to add a bit of cushioning to my steps in these shoes, since the sole is thin and intended for a 'barefoot'-type walking style, as I understand it, which I'm not used to. Still, with just those cheap insoles I bought separately, the shoes fit perfectly and are easy to walk in normally. I would recommend these to anyone like me with wide feet.
Only had these for two months and the soles are coming unglued and falling off.
The shoe fit well lightweight and easy to pack in your bag if need be. The only downside I would say shoelace is a bit long

I've been wearing Whitin shoes for quite some time now, and I must say, I absolutely love these things. They honestly deserve a listing on Goat.com. In fact, I believe they deserve a partnership with Supreme. Imagine how hard these photos would go if these shoes had a very prominent red supreme logo on them. You guys should consider making an Instagram account to market these bad boys. I'll promote for you guys.
I’ve been wearing these barefoot shoes for a few months now and absolutely love them!
Big size jump from 41 to 42.  I'm in between with a 10" foot.  Also these really aren't that wide.  Yes the toe box is more foot shaped but overall I wouldn't call them a wide shoe at all.
I’ve had these since June. They are comfortable but the laces were too long and the tongue was too short. They have started to com unstitched already.
Not a lot of cushion in the heel, so a thicker insert may be needed for high impact activity or prolonged standing on hard surfaces.
He said they fit and are comfortable!

评论概述: I wear size 10.5 and ordered 11 fit great
评论详情: I wasn't sure what size to get since I'm a half size 10.5 so I decided to go with size 11 larger since most Asian made shoes run small and I'm glad I did. They fit perfect enough so I have room for my toes to move around and not squashed together.
Love how stylistic and comfortable this shoe fits. Also when have them on I do get lots of compliments from friends and people alike.
So far they seem to go well. I don't have much complaints. They don't feel like I am walking on bare ground, which is what I was looking for, but it may have just been me making a bad purchase.
These shoes are awesome, once you break them in they’re super comfortable, versatile, and stylish. I feel like a ninja, and I suggest them to everyone who looks at them.
They fit perfectly and I love them and they're worth the money and very light

I recently bought these for an outfit I wore for a night of celebrating a couple special occasions with my wife. I have to say that they are very stylish and very comfortable. They are extremely lightweight and fit perfectly. The material is very breathable but they are still comfortable to wear on a chilly night out. I highly recommend them!
Excellent compared to other more expensive big brand bare foot shoes.
I like the ankle support these offer. They just feel nice and comfortable for a minimalistic shoe.

I have bought to pairs of these shoes, so far the first pair was perfect I still use them, not sure what happened the second pair but the inner sole always get scrunched up and I have to constantly take my shoe off during work and adjust the sole it is very annoying.  Could we get custom insert soles made for these shoes please ? Other than that the shoe is still great like i said my first pair were perfect and use them for every activity outside of work .
My son in law loves these
Very nice. Pretty comfortable.
A really good option for the price. This shoe has a very thick high-top making it very comfortable when walking and working out.
Light weight and very comfortable after a long day in work shoes. Look good enough for a casual night out. Can’t beat the price. True to size.

Very impressed with these. It like true perfect fit and feel for my feet. Glad I went with the size 11 not the 10. Give a great fit with thicker and thin socks.  I've worn these high top Whitins for hiking and working out at the gym. I still find myself wearing then with my everyday outfit. I will be getting another pair, definitely in another color. Might try the low tops next.
The fit was good but, they are one ugly looking pair of shoes. I might wear them with long pants, they might be decent. But with shorts, looks like clown shoes. 🤪

The most comfortable outdoor shoes I ever bought. After wearing them about a month, the sole started pulling away from the canvas. I applied shoeglue but that only lasted a couple of days. Now I've got them gorilla taped to make them last long enough for me to find a pair of comfortable summer shoes that last longer than two months.
Best one wheel shoe
Great fit, GREAT COMFORT.

My first pair of shoes from this company were the Minimalist Barefoot Sneakers. I really liked them and decided to get these high top version. I actually prefer these a bit more. Super comfortable to wear and walk around in. Glad I found these because I usually don’t have much luck finding shoes I like in the stores. I’ll be grabbing some more in different colors.
These shoes are comfortable and fit my foot well but they're quite warm and get my feet sweating after only a short time.
These shoes are extremely comfortable. I love wearing them.

I love these shoes! Very comfortable and I love that they're high tops. High tops can be hard to find in the barefoot world.  I really really wish they'd make a leather version of these. One complaint is that they don't have half sizes. I'm a 12.5 and can only get 12 or 13

评论概述: Solid casual wide toe box shoe
评论详情: Good casual shoe for those that like Altra/etc but don't want to wear bright yellow and green shoes all the time

评论概述: Comfortable and good value for the cost
评论详情: Nice casual shoe with the deed benefit of zero lift.
These are my second pair from this brand and they are very well priced and very comfortable! Definitely worth the buy!

So far these shoes are super comfortable. It's only been 2 weeks but they're holding up just fine. Went on an unplanned short hike and they got muddy but cleaned up real nice. My only issue is they do feel like they make my feet hot, almost like slippers. Will update if things change.
light weight, comfortable, stable, well made, nice design, big toe box.... worth the money.  Better than expected.
Comfortable and super light weight but pretty sturdy. My feet don’t ache as bad after wearing these all day. Soles are holding up well and I even like wearing them when I’m riding my motorcycle.

评论概述: Rarely does a shoe of this quality provide such good fit and comfort
评论详情: Whitin high-top size 44 was a perfect fit for my 10.5 EE feet. Toe box is roomy and the shoes felt great on a trial run dog walk. No squeaky sounds. Look to be of solid construction. Time will tell.
Expectations were high , but the shoe wasn't.  It looked comfortable and that was about all I can say. Sizing was off by a foot ! Pun fully intended.

评论概述: Wide toe box makes a huge difference
评论详情: Haven’t gone the flat more natural shoe style in awhile due to them usually being too narrow but these shoes are super comfortable! Testing them out day 1 right now and I’m walking on a cloud down the street yet I can feel every crack.

评论概述: Toe box not as wide as low-top Whitin Canvas, not very breathable
评论详情: Disclaimer: I bought these to skateboard in after enjoying skating in the low-top canvas version of these shoes.  Unfortunately, the toe box on the high-top canvas version is not as wide as in the low-top.  Also, these shoes are not as breathable as the low-tops, and get quite hot in the summer.
Bought two kinds of barefoot style shoes like these but this one just looked funny compared to the other pair. Harder to get on and off.
Fixing my walking. Fixing my feet. Fixing my knee. Fixing my back. Favorite. Buying more.
The throat is smaller than my foot's height and breadth.  I could not get these on The narrowness made it very uncomfortable.  (this was a "wide" shoe.)

评论概述: These seem to run a little bigger than the previous high top model.
评论详情: But they still fit like shoes should fit.

The insoles slide, and the seams are wearing loose more than a bit too fast, but the comfort makes that matter very little. Besides, the canvas construction makes it easy to repair if you know how. That's the point though: I shouldn't have to repair my own shoes that haven't even been in my possession for 6 months.  Decent Shoes. Ultra Comfy.

All thou my feet are pretty wide, the was plenty of room left in the shoe. Didn’t care much for the flat sole with no support, I wouldn’t last wearing those on a long walk. The light weight is a good thing, quality is acceptable. Squicky when on hard wood or linoleum floor. Not going to keep em.

评论概述: after 5 minutes of comfort, youll remember its a squeaky canvas
评论详情: The canvas shoes come in light weight, flexible, and bright white. Really comfortable with box toe space -great for office use and leisure.  Cons: The shoes squeak (basketball court squeaks) a lot and everywhere the floor isn't carpet or concrete. The canvas and other material at the foxing is difficult to clean. Stains super easily. Putting on the shoe is difficult - there is no bootstrap / heelstrap to pull. Overall price

I just received these shoes only about 15 minutes ago put them on and I can already feel and tell they fit 100% perfect. Will need to test them out for a few days of course. Go for a walk. Work out a little in them. Maybe around town etc. Nevertheless I am able to know right away the size was 100% spot on. I wear a men’s size 10 and ordered the 10 even tho a few reviews said order up. They feel extremely comfortable and well made. They’re probably not designed for heavy use or heavy working out running basketball and things like that but I’m already thinking if you take care of these shoes and keep them clean they should last you quite a long time. Shoe laces in my opinion are better than average quality. Some people said they had issues with the laces. I don’t know about that. mine are great. Few family members already noticed and asked where I got them. Seems like they like them enough to have their own. I will probably order 1 or 2 more pairs very soon since I’m at least 90% confident that whenever this pair wears out I will want the same shoes again without having to be concerned if they’re ever discontinued at some point. Anyways I will absolutely recommend these shoes. I got the black with the white soles and laces and look cool and study enough for me. Besides I you don’t like them Amazon will let you return most things anyways so hey. Hope the review helps!

评论概述: My first wide toe box shoe
评论详情: My first wide toe box shoe so far very comfortable

评论概述: Good way to build your foot muscles if your going barefoot type shoes
评论详情: I like these, I use them out in the woods with heavy wool socks ive been using barefoot shoes for a couple of year's have several low cut from this company. If your new into barefoot shoes these are good to break your feet in. Im about to pull the trigger on a very expensive pair of leather hiking barefoot boots by vevo, but honestly these work well and hold up well. On my first pair I used a pair of super soles that I took out of some delaminated asolos provided a bit more support as my foot muscles developed.

Bought these a month ago, I work in a warehouse walking about 6 miles a day on concrete and steel. So far the shoe has held up with no issues, the grip is great, and the design makes it look like any other shoe. I have wide and flat feet, this is a very comfortable shoe for my foot and doesn’t cause a lot of pain either. If you live in a very hot place maybe look at there other options since it isn’t breathable but it’s not unbearable.

评论概述: The most comfortable shoe out of the box I have ever worn, toe shape may be odd to some
评论详情: I have wide feet and high arches.  These are the most comfortable shoes I have ever worn out of the box with one note: I put high arch insoles in all my shoes, so I put some in these too.  The included insoles are paper thin, so expect that.  The soles have good grip on wet floors and the material is thick enough for support, but thin enough to breath.They do have a asymetric toe box that you notice looking straight down, but nobody else notices it and asks which Vans they are.
I had to return these. Size 13 fit more like a size 11.5. And 13 was the biggest they had.
Was stoked to wear these with my new outfit for a work event but now I’m not.  Not sure what this came from but this is unfortunate with them being all white shoes, they are discolored and stained.

评论概述: Great sneaker & price for those with wide feet, but….
评论详情: These sneakers are very high quality at a great price and come in a wide width, which is very hard to find (unless you want to spend a ton of money).  The only thing is that, at least for me, they run a size small.  I usually wear a size 12, but had to go with a size 13.
I have a wider size foot but these sneaks feel very good .

I know they don’t cost very much but my insoles are worn out after two weeks of wear. They also were cut about a 1/4” too short. The shoe as a whole seems pretty well made and they are comfortable but pretty disappointed with the durability.

Seems like these sneakers will last a long time. They look good and feel good, too. Actually, I pretty much only use zero drop, minimalist shoes and Whitin shoes hold up a lot better than brands 4x the price.  Even on long hikes.  Solid, affordable minimalist shoes.

I bought a different pair of Whitin's and really liked them.  When I started a new job I needed something with a little more protection (canvas works) so I bought this pair and I'm so glad I did!  I have had Plantar fasciitis  for a while and these shoes help a lot even though they are "flat."  There's still some arch support and I was surprised and how good my feet feel after walking around on a concrete floor all day.  The wide toe is exactly what I needed too!  The only thing I added was a cushion layer, I use a simple Dr Scholes "odor eater" style insert so it doesn't change the conure of the shoe.
Soles sqeak so loud dogs bark!

Everything about the shoe is great, it fits true to size and I love wearing them.  I'd like to see the laces in white, but that's not important.  The laces twist when you don't want them to, they snag and have fuzzies all the time, and they start to break down.  A thicker circular lace would probably fix all the problems these flat laces have.

After an entire life of shoes that pinch at the toes, it was weird feeling "free" inside these shoes. But you get over that in about 2 minutes when walking around and than you're asking yourself why did it take so long for these types of shows to be made.  These are not heavy duty shoes that will last a lifetime. They are a cost effective and well designed shoe that will most likely fall apart in a year if worn regularly. But for the price and the comfort they offer, it's money well spent. Buy one less pizza/beer dinner and put that money away to replace these in a year's time.

评论概述: Best Shoe Purchase I Have Made
评论详情: I had purchased shoes from WHITIN before, and I have worn them every day since. I was beyond excited to see that they had expanded their available models and created a stylish everyday shoe. Everywhere I go people compliment my shoes and ask what brand I’m wearing, and I’m always ecstatic to direct them to WHITIN. Also, as someone with wide feet, finding a shoe that fits me well is always a challenge, however I’ve never had this issue with WHITIN. I’m able to comfortably (and stylishly) wear the shoes as soon as they arrive. WHITIN has created a lifelong customer out of me.
I wanted a lightweight, flexible shoe. Very happy.
Love these

评论用户: I can’t even explain what we are lol
评论详情: I really do want to like these shoes. Thing is, they look kind of meh like Walmart meh and I feel that $45 is a bit steep. Rather cheap feeling, and except for the zero drop and wide toe box, offer little more in looks than something they might give out as a standard generic shoe at a hospital if ya know what I mean. They are however comfortable and didn't seem like I'd have problems with support and padding. I'm really hoping Whitin gets their act together and comes up with some better design and color choices. They certainly missed out on the summer crowd with their less then stellar options in high tops. I ordered a bunch of these "barefoot" style shoes and so far were impressed with some hi top Chinese toe looking shoes I found on here, took a month to get. I have a few Merrells coming this week. We'll see how the expensive ones compare.

I’m loving these things from the comfort to the price. I’ve been wearing them for almost a month now and no complaints. I followed their figment guide and they fit like gloves. I no longer feel pain on the side knuckle of my small toe bones from being crushed all day. I’ve been pondering getting these wider toe shoes but have been put off by the price of other brands. Whitin shoes look great and are the lowest price for these type of shoes I’ve found. They even beat the price of a similar shoe I saw advertised on TikTok. I will update as to their durability as I put them through the paces. So far the only thing I’ve noticed is they screech on sudden stops or direction changes , kinda like you hear basket ballers make on the court, it’s from the sort of softer rubber on the soles. It not a problem , I just noticed I’m screeching a lot. Otherwise they’re perfect!

评论概述: Sizing is junk and the reviews are lying
评论详情: I normally wear an 11.5-12 US men's and have for 10+ years. I ordered the 12s and my toes were jammed against the end of the shoe. I returned those and got the 13s and they were the exact same shoe, toe still jammed against the inside despite being a full size bigger. The shoes felt fine but their sizing is junk.
I have several pairs of "barefoot" shoes because I absolutely love the feel. I would say these are definitely in my top 2.

I have never worn barefoot shoes before. After wearing them for a couple days they have been amazing for my feet. However the insole scoots back during wear. The right insole rides back halfway down the foot to where it comes up the heel of the shoe.

I recently got into barefoot shoes and have been wanting a pair of these for a bit. I finally meet some others that wear them and asked them about their experiences. It is what made me buy a pair. I enjoy the hight tops and it hides my toes socks that are a bit higher than no show. The only issue I have found sonfar is the insole seems to ride backwards and then my toes seem to feel the edge. Going to try and fix them and if not will plan on wearing them with no insole. None of my other barefoot shoes have insoles so it should be fine. Very comfy would recommend.
I ordered all white shoes and it wasn’t all the same white it was two kinds of white in the shoe which made it not look to good but the feel of it and walking in it was great.
These shoes are just great. Love the wide toe box and the almost barefoot sensation. Toes and foot are able to spread out and function in a more natural way. Build quality seems to be good.

Decent product. The material feels good, there is a nice cushion on the heel and the canvas of the shoes fees sturdy. The toe box felt roomy. That being said, order the next size up. I wear 12s in other shoes and boots but with these, my toes were right up into the tip when walking.

评论概述: Good starter but not as wide as I'd like
评论详情: Overall this is a decent shoe I jsut wish it was as wide as some of the other shoes I've gotten from whitin especially since I like the high tops jsut even at an 11 wide it doesn't feel as wide as I'd like.

评论概述: Comfortable but hot and poor ventilation
评论详情: Comfortable and affordable shoe but has almost no ventilation it seems. Used for almost two months for workouts and the sweat just builds in the shoe and gets really hot. Now they smell pretty bad.
My son loves these fits as expected comfortable
Foot of good and comfortable
